Report-Type.title: Report type: C2
Report-Type.description: The type of the report: a C2 server.

Report-Description.title: Report description
Report-Description.description: The description of the report. This is a free text field characterising the report that should be used for a human readable description rather than for automatic processing. As a rule of thumb, this should not be longer than one sentence.

Date.title: Time of the reported observation
Date.description: The timestamp when the C2 server was observed.

Source-Type.title: Type of the reported object: IP
Source-Type.description: The type of the reported object: an IP address.

Source.title: C2 IP
Source.description: The IP address of the C2 server.

Confidence-Level.title: Confidence level of the report
Confidence-Level.description: The level of confidence put into the accuracy of the report. A number between 0.0 and 1.0 with 0.0 being unreliable and 1.0 being verified to be accurate.

Report-Subcategory.title: C2 subcategory
Report-Subcategory.description: The control channel used by the C2.

Report-ID.title: Report ID
Report-ID.description: The ID of the report. This is the report ID in the CCH with the suffix @acdc-project.eu.

Duration.title: Duration of the C2 observation
Duration.description: The duration in seconds during which the C2 server was observed. This can be the timespan during which connections to the C2 server were successful.

Reported-At.title: Time of the report's submission
Reported-At.description: The timestamp when the report was submitted to the CCH.

Botnet.title: Botnet C2 is attributed to
Botnet.description: The botnet the C2 server is attributed to.

Additional-Data.title: Additional data
Additional-Data.description: Additional data for the observation. This allows putting more specific information into a report on a case by case basis in a structured manner. The usage of this field is at the data providers discretion.

Alternate-Format-Type.title: Type of the alternate format
Alternate-Format-Type.description: The type of the alternate format description of the observation.

Alternate-Format.title: Alternate format description of the observation
Alternate-Format.description: A description of the observation in an alternate format.

Ip-Version.title: IP version number
Ip-Version.description: The IP version of the C2 server's IP address.

Ip-Protocol-Number.title: IP protocol number
Ip-Protocol-Number.description: The IANA assigned decimal internet protocol number used for C2 connections.

C2-Ip-V4.title: IPv4 of the C2
C2-Ip-V4.description: The IPv4 of the C2 server. If set, this field equals Source.

C2-Ip-V6.title: IPv6 of the C2
C2-Ip-V6.description: The IPv6 of the C2 server. If set, this field equals Source.

C2-Mode.title: C2 IP mode
C2-Mode.description: The mode of the C2 server IP. This can be plain for unaltered IPs, anon for anonymised IPs, or pseudo for pseudonymised IPs.

C2-Port.title: C2 Port of C2 connections
C2-Port.description: The port of C2 connections on the C2 server.

User-Agent.title: Name and version of the generating software

TLP.title: Sensitivity of the report in TLP
